content: The decrease in earnings per share resulted primarily from the impact of the impairment charge related to our assets in Russia and the 2021 gain on Persol shares, all net of tax, adjusting for those transactions as well as the gain on sale of assets, Q2 2022 EPS was $0.45 compared to adjusted EPS of $0.49 per share in Q2 2021, although adjusted pretax income is higher in 2022, adjusted EPS declined on higher 2022 tax expense compared to the same period of 2021.
